hymn.title: I have fought the good fight

layout.singingstanza: I have fought the good fight; I have fin -- ished the course; I have fought the good fight; I have kept the faith. Hence -- forth there is laid up for me The crown of righ -- teous -- ness, Which the Lord, the Righ -- teous Judge, Will re -- com -- pense me in that day, And not on -- ly me But al -- so all those who have loved His ap -- pear -- ing.

lyrics.stanza: Henceforth there is laid up for me The crown of righteousness, Which the Lord, the Righteous Judge, Will recompense me in that day, And not only me But also all those who have loved His appearing.
